title: I cannot join a Club Either
body: My summoners name is xo 666 xo - Made a new account cause my main got banned , But Does this mean I can't join clubs on alternatives accounts now ? Because my Main got banned.... I won't be rude anymore I promise I've learned my lesson Riot.

replies.body: Unless you were trying to join at level 1, I don't see anything that would be blocking you from joining a club.  If this is still an issue, reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into this with you.
